h2_title: Wandering Wight Boss Fight and Guide
content: Do be warned however, that you should defeat this optional boss before you unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area by ringing three large bells. Once you challenge the boss of the Ancient Guanyin Temple, the Wandering Wight will disappear, and you will no longer be able to challenge him and gain his rewards!

This is an excerpt from the file 'Wandering_Wight.md', within the main section titled 'Wandering Wight', specifically from the subsection 'Wandering Wight Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Do be warned however, that you should defeat this optional boss before you unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area by ringing three large bells. Once you challenge the boss of the Ancient Guanyin Temple, the Wandering Wight will disappear, and you will no longer be able to challenge him and gain his rewards!
